summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of LuxScaler v27 application. Backend APIs fully functional, frontend mostly working with minor slider interaction issues.

ui_bugs.issue: Sliders appear to be custom components, not standard HTML range inputs - interaction testing limited
ui_bugs.selector: Custom slider elements in pillar columns

design_issues.issue: Phosphor icons (Sparkles, Terminal) were missing - replaced with emoji fallbacks

passed_tests: AUTO toggle functionality (4 toggles found and working)
User mode switching to PRO (with PRO MODE indicator)
Generation functionality (input, generate button, output display)
Slider value updates (backend confirmed value 7 -> HIGH level)
Snippet text updates (restoration mode text for HIGH level)
action_item_for_main_agent: Consider adding proper Phosphor icons package or use alternative icon library. Slider interaction works via backend but UI feedback could be improved.
